metadata.name: The Invite
metadata.description:
Dear Mooncat2878,

Congrats on the successful bid. I cordially invite you to my game where you will play the role of the Game Master. Throughout this event, you will face a variety of decisions, encounter upsets and you should be aware that unknowns can happen at any moment.

Terms and conditions:

- The game rewards participation, and those that venture the furthest.  
- Your decisions affect all players. and the outcomes are unknown to you  
- Your apprentice has been selected. phillipthefirst will aid you in your decisions  
- For as long as you hold this letter, you will recieve gifts  
- Prepare for unknowns  
- Expect upsets.
